org.drip.analytics.definition

Class FXBasisCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.FXBasisCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DerivedFXBasis

    public abstract class FXBasisCurve
extends Serializer
implements Curve
    This abstract class exposes the FXBasis curve representing term structure of FX basis. Basis can be full or bootstrapped.

        public abstract double[] getFullFXFwd(ValuationParams valParam,
                    DiscountCurve dcNum,
                    DiscountCurve dcDenom,
                    boolean bBasisOnDenom,
                    boolean bFwdAsPIP)
        Returns the array of full FX Forwards
        Parameters:
        valParam - ValuationParams
        dcNum - Discount Curve Numerator
        dcDenom - Discount Curve Numerator
        bBasisOnDenom - True if the basis is on the denominator
        bFwdAsPIP - True if the FX Forwards are to represented as PIP
        Returns:
        Array of FXForward
